Class WindowController

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Window
              java.awt.Frame
                  javax.swing.JFrame
                      WindowController
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public abstract class WindowController
extends javax.swing.JFrame

Class that controls the window and buttons.

Version:
1.1
Author:
Chris Lovell, University of Southampton 2009
See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

WindowController

public WindowController()
Default constructor, provides 4 buttons and a 30 by 30 grid with grid lines turned on.

WindowController

public WindowController(java.lang.String windowName)
Constructor allowing the window name to be changed. Also provides 4 buttons, and a 30 by 30 grid with grid lines turned on.

Parameters:
windowName - The name to display on the window.

WindowController

public WindowController(java.lang.String windowName,
                        int numberButtons)
Constructor allowing the window name and the number of buttons to be set. Also provides a 30 by 30 grid with grid lines turned on.

Parameters:
windowName - The name for the window.
numberButtons - The number of buttons to have in the window.

WindowController

public WindowController(java.lang.String windowName,
                        int numberButtons,
                        boolean drawGridLines)
Constructor allowing the window name, the number of buttons and whether the grid lines should be drawn to be set. Also provides a 30 by 30 grid.

Parameters:
windowName - The number of buttons to have in the window.
numberButtons - The number of buttons to have.
drawGridLines - Whether to draw the grid lines or not.

WindowController

public WindowController(java.lang.String windowName,
                        int numberButtons,
                        int gridWidth,
                        int gridHeight,
                        int gridSquareSize,
                        boolean drawGridLines)
Constructor allowing all but the draw speed parameter to be adjusted.

Parameters:
windowName - The name for the window.
numberButtons - The number of buttons to have in the window.
gridWidth - The width of the grid.
gridHeight - The height of the grid.
gridSquareSize - The size of each grid square in pixels (normally 10).
drawGridLines - Whether to draw the grid lines or not.

WindowController

public WindowController(java.lang.String windowName,
                        int numberButtons,
                        int gridWidth,
                        int gridHeight,
                        int gridSquareSize,
                        boolean drawGridLines,
                        int sleepTime)
Constructor allowing all parameters to be adjusted.

Parameters:
windowName - The name for the window.
numberButtons - The number of buttons to have in the window.
gridWidth - The width of the grid.
gridHeight - The height of the grid.
gridSquareSize - The size of each grid square in pixels (normally 10).
drawGridLines - Whether to draw the grid lines or not.
sleepTime - How long to wait between calls to update.

WindowController

public WindowController(java.lang.String windowName,
                        int numberButtons,
                        int gridWidth,
                        int gridHeight,
                        int gridSquareSize,
                        boolean drawGridLines,
                        int sleepTime,
                        int windowWidth,
                        int windowHeight)
Constructor allowing all parameters to be adjusted. Also allows for manual resizing of the window.

Parameters:
windowName - The name for the window.
numberButtons - The number of buttons to have in the window.
gridWidth - The width of the grid.
gridHeight - The height of the grid.
gridSquareSize - The size of each grid square in pixels (normally 10).
drawGridLines - Whether to draw the grid lines or not.
sleepTime - How long to wait between calls to update.
Method Detail

getGridWidth

protected int getGridWidth()
Returns the width of the grid (x-axis) in grid squares.

Returns:
The grid width.

getGridHeight

protected int getGridHeight()
Returns the height of the grid (y-axis) in grid squares.

Returns:
The grid height.

start

public void start()
Starts the application. Call this in your constructor after you have initialised any variables and set the text of any buttons or labels.

setButtonText

protected void setButtonText(int id,
                             java.lang.String text)
                      throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
Sets the text displayed in a button.

Parameters:
id - The id number of the button to change the text of.
text - The new text for the button.
Throws:
java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - Thrown if the id does not belong to one of the buttons.

setLabelText

protected void setLabelText(java.lang.String text)
Sets the text of the label.

Parameters:
text - The new text to set the label.

setGridColour

protected void setGridColour(int x,
                             int y,
                             int colour)
                      throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
Sets the colour of the give grid square.

Parameters:
x - The x position of the grid square, starts at 0.
y - The y position of the grid square, starts at 0.
colour - The colour to set the grid square.
Throws:
java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - Thrown if the x and y position are outside of the range of the grid.

draw

protected void draw(DrawableObject drawableObject)
Provides the given DrawableObject with a GraphicsController object to draw to.

Parameters:
drawableObject - The object to be drawn.

buttonPressed

protected abstract void buttonPressed(int id)
Called when a button is pressed.

Parameters:
id - The id of the button pressed.

update

protected abstract void update()
Called every 0.5 seconds automatically.

keyPressed

protected abstract void keyPressed(Key b)
Called when a button is pressed.

Parameters:
b - The button pressed.

keyReleased

protected abstract void keyReleased(Key b)
Called when a button is released.

Parameters:
b - The button released.
